overview: Gabby, known as Atomix Blond, is a young mutant with androgynous power. She becomes Gabriel when she turns into a man. After being attacked and escaping her attackers, she tries to reach Jordan said Demolition Ass, a mutant last generation, the power to have female orgasms to men by kissing them. She wants to warn him of imminent danger. A secret organization, led by the powerful Eden, wants to seize Jordan to extract its DNA and create a synthesis juice for commercialization on a large scale. Eden said Candy Boy, with the powers to pump and extract the juice, even the most refractory, will face Atomix Blond. Will he succeed?
title: Atomix Blond
